briefTitle: Health Benefits of Expressive Writing: Study One
officialTitle: Expressive Writing Among Chinese Breast Cancer Survivors: Study One
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in quality of life score as assessed by Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy Scale (FACT).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 1) having a breast cancer diagnosis
* 2) completing primary medical treatment within four years
* 3) being comfortable writing and speaking Chinese (i.e. Mandarin or Cantonese)
